DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the sun protection effect and efficacy in treatment of sunburn using topical corticosteroids in a randomised controlled and investigator blinded trial.
DOC.brief_title: The Sun Protection Effect and Efficacy in Treatment of Sunburn Using Topical Corticosteroids.
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older, healthy, fair skinned (skin type IIII) Pregnant or lactating women.In treatment with corticosteroids.
